Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute near Madison/Paulina
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Madison/Paulina, due to street blockage near Madison/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Madison/Paulina, due to street blockage near Madison/Paulina.

Eastbound #20 Madison buses will operate via Madison, Paulina, Washington, Damen, Madison and over regular route.

Westbound #20 Madison buses will operate via Madison, Damen, Warren, Paulina, Madison and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Montrose
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Montrose due to a medical emergency on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Montrose due to a medical emergency on the tracks. 

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service between Harlem(O'Hare) and Damen/Milwaukee to provide connecting service.

At this time, consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines while we work to provide alternatives.

This may include:
#78 Montrose
#56 Milwaukee
#53 Irving Park
#152 Addison
#77 Belmont

See station personnel for further assistance and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for the latest service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time

Headline: No Trains Between Harlem (O'Hare Branch) and Damen/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem (O'Hare Branch) and Damen/Milwaukee due to a medical emergency on the tracks near Montrose.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem (O'Hare Branch) and Damen/Milwaukee due to a medical emergency on the tracks near Montrose.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Harlem (O'Hare Branch) and,
  • between Damen and Forest Park, only.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Harlem and Damen to provide connecting service.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#78 Montrose
#56 Milwaukee
#80 Irving Park
#152 Addison
#77 Belmont

See station personnel for further assistance and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
